input.sentences: old tombstones are an art of sorts .

this is a statue type marker .
simple and humble would describe this gravestone .

output.sentences: This is a very old graveyard.
There are lots of tombstones and grave markers.
Some are made of stone, some are marble
They are all unusual especially for as old as they are.
Wow, some of these date back to the 1800's.
